No. 229503)} Sub: Installation of Vehicle Location Tracking Devices/ GPS on Construction Vehicles deployed at site by Contractor/ Concessionaire It may be mentioned that there are number of cases in which Contractors/ Concessionaire claim for idling charges for their Construction Vehicles deployed at site due to non-availability of sufficient land, force majeure events etc. In order to verify such claims of contractors/ concessionaires pertaining to idling of machinery, it has been decided that the provisions for GPS enabled tracking of all construction vehicles deployed by Contractor/ Concessionaire shall be inserted in the Standard Documents of Civil Works viz.
